author: tmiller
msg: stubbed out methods now thrown exception to warn users instead of returning null

author: sboag
msg: Added SAX2DTM class, as an alternative to the DTMDocumentImpl
class.  Currently about 30 failures in the conformance suite.
Also took non-DOM stuff out of DOM2DTM and put it in
DTMDefaultBase, so it can share as an abstract base class
SAX2DTM doesn't have any CoRoutine support yet.

author: sboag
msg: New default DTM base, used as a base class for DOM2DTM and
SAX2DTM.  Manages traversal, but not data storage.

author: sboag
msg: In the constructor, do stringToIndex("") to force empty strings to be index 0.
This helps to quickly determine empty strings, and to make "" vs.
